data.title: Geographical Position Extent and Borders
data.meta_description: Geographical_Position_Extent_and_Borders - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Croatia is located at the intersection of Central Europe, the Mediterranean region, and the Pannonian Plain. As such, it shares characteristics of multiple regions. Unlike neighboring Slovenia, Croatia has had a connection to the Eastern Adriatic coast for over 1300 years, representing an important Mediterranean cultural tradition, rather than a recent development. Croatia's dual geographic positioning between regions has significantly influenced its social and economic development.
